channel.title: Please can any 1 show me how to make IP ban work
channel.description:
i relly need a working IP banner because when i do it nothing hapens it just banns the account... ive tried http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,65656.0.html (a tut on ip banning by lothy) but it didnt work it just rejects evreyones IP including mine. can anyone help i get noobs on autotypers spamming, swearing, advertising, people attcking npcs, people on cheat clients etc. please help.
note: this is what it get when i tried lothy's tut. [IMG]http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p301/spackerdoo/lothystut.jpg[/img]
and i am not in the bannedips text document.. or the banned users[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 03:23:13 PM[/size][hr]Please some 1 help...

item.title: Please can any 1 show me how to make IP ban work
item.dc:creator: @pkaz_0wnt pkaz 0wnt
item.description:
@pkaz_0wnt wrote:

i got this error

client.java:10051: ')' expected if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("localhost")) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 06:38:50 AM[/size][hr]k fixed that now i get this client.java:10058: cannot find symbol symbol : method appendToIp(java.lang.String) location: class client appendToIp(victim); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

any 1 help?

item.source: Please can any 1 show me how to make IP ban work

item.title: Please can any 1 show me how to make IP ban work
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Delete lothy’s thing, add this command if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) { String victim = command.substring(6); if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("localhost")) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else { PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToIp(victim); } } and add this int public int ipban = 0; Add the int under this public boolean isUntradable(int item) { for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) { if(untradable[i] == item) return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
